seniority_level.evidence: Title 'BI Data Engineer' combined with 6+ years experience requirement aligns with senior level in data engineering hierarchy

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer' and responsibilities focus on data pipelines, ETL, and data warehousing

sub_specialty.evidence: Heavy emphasis on SSIS, data migration, dimensional modeling, and batch reporting tools (SSRS, OBIEE) rather than streaming technologies

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of managing teams or mentoring; responsibilities focus on individual technical execution and collaboration with analysts/product managers

primary_cloud.evidence: Heavy focus on Microsoft SQL Server, Oracle Database, SSIS, SSRS - all on-premise technologies with no cloud services mentioned

secondary_clouds.evidence: No cloud platforms mentioned in the job posting or Pass 1 extraction

processing_paradigm.evidence: Focus on ETL tools (SSIS), data migration, and scheduled reporting (SSRS, OBIEE) indicates batch processing orientation

orchestrator_category.evidence: SSIS is mentioned as primary ETL tool, which falls under 'airflow_like' category for orchestration of batch workflows

storage_layer.evidence: Explicit mention of data warehousing, dimensional models, SSAS cubes, and relational databases (SQL Server, Oracle) indicates warehouse-focused storage

remote_restriction.evidence: Location specified as Queens, NY with hybrid work model, suggesting requirement to be in NYC metro area

timezone_focus.evidence: US-only restriction with NY state requirement indicates focus on US time zones

relocation_required.evidence: Location specified as Queens, NY with no mention of remote options beyond hybrid, implying relocation may be required

h1b_friendly.evidence: No mention of visa sponsorship in Pass 1 extraction, suggesting no H1B support

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: 6+ years experience requirement and no mention of student visa support suggests OPT/CPT not accommodated

citizenship_required.evidence: US-only restriction with no specific citizenship requirement mentioned, implying work authorization is sufficient

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time permanent position with salary compensation suggests W2 employment

benefits_level.evidence: Learning budget and conference attendance mentioned, but no comprehensive benefits package (equity, unlimited PTO, etc.) described

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Company description mentions 'professional growth' but no specific career tracks or promotion paths are outlined

mentorship_signals.evidence: Mentions working with analysts, product managers, and business users, suggesting collaborative environment but no formal mentorship program

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No explicit mention of promotions or advancement opportunities in the job posting

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers or lateral moves in the job posting

career_tracks_available.evidence: No specific career tracks (IC, management, specialist, architect) mentioned in the job posting

requirement_strictness.evidence: All skills listed as 'must have' with no 'nice to have' skills, indicating strict requirements

scope_definition.evidence: Focused job description centered on BI data engineering with specific tools and responsibilities outlined

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: 6+ years experience requirement aligns with senior level; skills are reasonable for that seniority in BI/data warehousing domain
